Html:
Hi,

First of all thanks for the great control. My sincere thanks to RADIOMAN and other contributors.
I am using this control in one of my projects. I have a requirement to load only Online Maps.
To accomplish this, i changed the Access mode to "ServerOnly". After this, i observed that the tiles are not getting cached/stored on to the local database (GMDB File).
My question here is, how to restrict the control from creating the GMDB File.
Since, i do not write anything to cache, there is no point in creating an empty GMDB file and keeping as it is.

Please provide me a way to restrict this control to create this file. Is there any other flag/property for this ?

Thanks and Regards,
Kishor Reddy
hack the code, or ignore it
